title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, October 12, 2020
description: On this day in 1823, Scottish chemist Charles Macintosh sold the first raincoat. They are still sometimes called "macs" in Great Britain.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1823, Scottish chemist Charles Macintosh sold the first raincoat. They are still sometimes called "macs" in Great Britain.
